cardContent.expanded: Mei Lin reports persistent fatigue, low mood, anxiety, negative self-beliefs, and difficulty maintaining coping strategies. She shows insight, is open to therapy, and benefits from grounding exercises.

cardContent.expanded: Ongoing fatigue, hopelessness, perfectionism, academic and family stress, negative self-worth, and struggles with consistency in self-care and coping strategies.
